data_table.description: Participant Follow-Up Status History (WHI Main Study and Extension). Note: The rel# in the file name is used by the submitter to track embargo releases. Files that have "rel2" or later may either contain additional variables or more recent data as compared to the previous rel#.

variable.name: FUSTARTDY
variable.description: Days since rand/enroll to start of participant's follow-up status
variable.comment: Days since randomization or enrollment to start of participant's follow-up status. Days since randomization or enrollment to a status of deceased does not represent date of death, but rather the date the participant's status was changed to deceased.

variable.name: FUENDDY
variable.description: Days since rand/enroll to end of participant's follow-up status
variable.comment: Days since randomization or enrollment to end of participant's follow-up status. A mssing value indicates this is the last/latest follow-up status recorded for the participant.

variable.name: FUSTATUS
variable.comment:
To determine the last/latest follow-up status recorded for a paticipant, use one of the following methods: (1) select the participant record with a missing value for FUENDDY or (2) select the participant record with the greatest FUSTARTDY value._x000D_
_x000D_
Until determined to be deceased, the last/latest follow-up status for a participant who did not consent to the WHI Extension 1 or Extension 2, is the follow-up status she had at the end of the study period for which she last consented.
